welcomeCandidate: Welcome! Your FitScore test is available. Please answer carefully and within the deadline so we can evaluate your profile.
welcomeRecruiter: Welcome! Here you can track candidate assessments. Stay tuned for deadlines and FitScore updates.
startTestDesc: Complete the form and discover your LEGAL FitScore.
dashboardDesc: Track candidates' results. Remember, you can only see the FitScore after the candidate finishes the test.
